QuestData.Title: Concern for Mankrik
QuestData.Description: I would ask a favor of you, $c.$B$BA warrior named Mankrik passed through our camp not long ago, on a lonely journey. His wife was killed by the quilboar, long ago, and he still seeks revenge. I cannot forget his eyes...burning with inconsolable hatred, every waking moment.$B$BWe did not talk long, but I cannot bear to think of him out there alone. Please, bring this to Mankrik, and tell him it is from me...
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Mahka's Gift to Mankrik, south of Firestone Point.
QuestData.RewardText: Mahka sent you?$B$B<Mankrik's fury quells for a moment.>$B$BIt is a small comfort. But nothing can console me until I am done here.
